plex-server.description: Describes the primary Plex server to which PMM can connect. This attribute is REQUIRED.  It can be overridden at the library level.

url.description: URL at which PMM can connect to your plex server.  NOT app.plex.tv

token.description: Admin token for this Plex server

timeout.description: Connection timeout for this Plex server

db_cache.description: Sets DB Cache value for this Plex server

clean_bundles.description: true/false - If 'true', cleans metadata bundles on this Plex server

empty_trash.description: true/false - If 'true', empties trash on this Plex server

optimize.description: true/false - If 'true', optimizes database on this Plex server

plex-server.title: plex
